citiesWillBeMarked: Cities closer to your mouse will be marked if the sum of their population is below the total COVID deaths in Brazil
forReferencesAboutInformation: For more references about information, take a look at the footer of the page
placeMouseOverMapForResults: Place the mouse over the map to see the results
thisMeansGhostTown: This means that COVID deaths in Brazil could have reduced the population of those cities to zero, making them completely ghost towns
